name: test_e2e_with_logs[766_HPP_WAF_002]
description:

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `HPP_WAF_002` |
| **Name** | HPP WAF bypass + isadmin |
| **Category** | HPP |
| **Subcategory** | waf_bypass |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `&isadmin=true&role[]=admin`
